About the Company: Kushal Tradelink Limited was formed in the year 2000 and also known as KTL that is closely held private limited company with the main object of dealing into various types of papers viz. Kraft, Duplex, News print waste, Cromo Art Paper etc. The most prominent paper trader and supplier was promoted under the flagship, leadership and guidance of Mr. Tulsiram Chiranjilal Agrawal, who was engaged in trading different kinds of papers since 1965 and started the business with the name of M/S Saraswati Trading Co. operating from Khadia, Ahmedabad.
